DataElement.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Complete Remission Status Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year complete remission was achieved.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Complete Remission Status
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.  This does not always mean the cancer has been cured._A condition or state at a particular time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.  This does not always mean the cancer has been cured.:A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.
A condition or state at a particular time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
